biotools.summary: A flexible software package for genetic association studies. It is designed to support unrelated individual or related (family-based) individuals. Both quantitative trait and binary trait are supported

bioschemas.summary: A flexible software package for genetic association studies. It is designed to support unrelated individual or related (family-based) individuals. Both quantitative trait and binary trait are supported
